verses.verse: וְעַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah now כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar But now thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בֹּרַאֲךָ֣ <S%H1254><s%> bo-ra-'a-Cha that created יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, thee O Jacob וְיֹצֶרְךָ֖ <S%H3335><s%> ve-yo-tzer-Cha and he that formed יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; thee O Israel אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּירָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra Fear כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for גְאַלְתִּ֔יךָ <S%H1350><s%> ge-'al-Ti-cha, not for I have redeemed קָרָ֥אתִי <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra-ti thee I have called בְשִׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> ve-shim-Cha [thee] by thy name לִי־ li- אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah. you

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When תַעֲבֹ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> ta-'a-Vor When thou passest through בַּמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> bam-Ma-yim the waters אִתְּךָ־ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-cha- for אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni, I וּבַנְּהָר֖וֹת <S%H5104><s%> u-van-ne-ha-Rot I [will be] with thee and through the rivers לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor יִשְׁטְפ֑וּךָ <S%H7857><s%> yish-te-Fu-cha; they shall not overflow כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When תֵלֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> te-Lech walk בְּמוֹ־ <S%H1119><s%> be-mov- through אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> 'esh the fire לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor תִכָּוֶ֔ה <S%H3554><s%> tik-ka-Veh, thou shalt not be burned וְלֶהָבָ֖ה <S%H3852><s%> ve-le-ha-Vah neither shall the flame לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor תִבְעַר־ <S%H1197><s%> tiv-'ar- kindle בָּֽךְ׃ Bach.

כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Ki, for אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ke-Doosh the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מוֹשִׁיעֶ֑ךָ <S%H3467><s%> mo-shi-'E-cha; thy Saviour נָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti I gave כָפְרְךָ֙ <S%H3724><s%> cha-fe-re-Cha [for] thy ransom מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, Egypt כּ֥וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> kush Ethiopia וּסְבָ֖א <S%H5434><s%> u-se-Va and Seba תַּחְתֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tei-cha. your place

מֵאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> me-'a-Sher you יָקַ֧רְתָּ <S%H3365><s%> ya-Kar-ta Since thou wast precious בְעֵינַ֛י <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Nai in my sight נִכְבַּ֖דְתָּ <S%H3513><s%> nich-Bad-ta thou hast been honourable וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni and I אֲהַבְתִּ֑יךָ <S%H157><s%> 'a-hav-Ti-cha; and I have loved וְאֶתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-'et-Ten thee therefore will I give אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam men תַּחְתֶּ֔יךָ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tei-cha, your place וּלְאֻמִּ֖ים <S%H3816><s%> u-le-'um-Mim for thee and people תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat exchange נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-She-cha. for thy life

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra Fear כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִתְּךָ־ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-cha- for אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni; I מִמִּזְרָח֙ <S%H4217><s%> mi-miz-Rach from the east אָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> 'a-Vi not for I [am] with thee I will bring זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'E-cha, thy seed וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֖ב <S%H4628><s%> u-mi-ma-'a-Rav thee from the west אֲקַבְּצֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H6908><s%> 'a-kab-be-Tze-ka. and gather

אֹמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mar I will say לַצָּפוֹן֙ <S%H6828><s%> latz-tza-fOn to the north תֵּ֔נִי <S%H5414><s%> Te-ni, Give up וּלְתֵימָ֖ן <S%H8486><s%> u-le-tei-Man and to the south אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּכְלָ֑אִי <S%H3607><s%> tich-La-'i; Keep not back הָבִ֤יאִי <S%H935><s%> ha-Vi-'i bring בָנַי֙ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nai my sons מֵרָח֔וֹק <S%H7350><s%> me-ra-Chok, from far וּבְנוֹתַ֖י <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tai and my daughters מִקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> mik-Tzeh from the ends הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> kol [Even] every one הַנִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> han-nik-Ra that is called בִשְׁמִ֔י <S%H8034><s%> vish-Mi, by my name וְלִכְבוֹדִ֖י <S%H3519><s%> ve-lich-vo-Di him for my glory בְּרָאתִ֑יו <S%H1254><s%> be-ra-Tiv; for I have created יְצַרְתִּ֖יו <S%H3335><s%> ye-tzar-Tiv I have formed אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- even עֲשִׂיתִֽיו׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si-Tiv. him yea I have made

הוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tzi Bring forth עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- people עִוֵּ֖ר <S%H5787><s%> 'iv-Ver the blind וְעֵינַ֣יִם <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Na-yim eyes יֵ֑שׁ <S%H3426><s%> Yesh; that have וְחֵרְשִׁ֖ים <S%H2795><s%> ve-che-re-Shim and the deaf וְאָזְנַ֥יִם <S%H241><s%> ve-'a-ze-Na-yim that have ears לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- All הַגּוֹיִ֞ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim Let all the nations נִקְבְּצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> nik-be-Tzu be gathered יַחְדָּ֗ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav, together וְיֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> ve-ye-'a-se-Fu be assembled לְאֻמִּ֔ים <S%H3816><s%> le-'um-Mim, and let the people מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who בָהֶם֙ va-Hem יַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> yag-Gid who among them can declare זֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> Zot, to us וְרִֽאשֹׁנ֖וֹת <S%H7223><s%> ve-ri-sho-Not the former יַשְׁמִיעֻ֑נוּ <S%H8085><s%> yash-mi-'U-nu; this and shew יִתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> yit-te-Nu add עֵֽדֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5707><s%> 'e-dei-Hem their witnesses וְיִצְדָּ֔קוּ <S%H6663><s%> ve-yitz-Da-ku, that they may be justified וְיִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> ve-yish-me-'U or let them hear וְיֹאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-yo-me-Ru and say אֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> 'e-Met. [It is] truth

אַתֶּ֤ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem You עֵדַי֙ <S%H5707><s%> 'e-Dai Ye [are] my witnesses נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD וְעַבְדִּ֖י <S%H5650><s%> ve-'av-Di and my servant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom בָּחָ֑רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> ba-Cha-re-ti; whom I have chosen לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an that תֵּ֠דְעוּ <S%H3045><s%> Te-de-'u that ye may know וְתַאֲמִ֨ינוּ <S%H539><s%> ve-ta-'a-Mi-nu and believe לִ֤י li וְתָבִ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H995><s%> ve-ta-Vi-nu me and understand כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, I am He לְפָנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai that I [am] he before לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no נ֣וֹצַר <S%H3335><s%> No-tzar formed אֵ֔ל <S%H410><s%> 'El, me there was no God וְאַחֲרַ֖י <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rai neither shall there be after לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo will be none יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh. become ס sa-Mek

אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; I [even] I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and there מִבַּלְעָדַ֖י <S%H1107><s%> mib-bal-'a-Dai and beside מוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> mo-Shi-a'. me [there is] no saviour

אָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi is I הִגַּ֤דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> hig-Gad-ti I have declared וְהוֹשַׁ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H3467><s%> ve-ho-Sha'-ti and have saved וְהִשְׁמַ֔עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> ve-hish-Ma'-ti, and I have shewed וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and there בָּכֶ֖ם ba-Chem זָ֑ר <S%H2114><s%> Zar; when [there was] no strange וְאַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem you עֵדַ֛י <S%H5707><s%> 'e-Dai [god] among you therefore ye [are] my witnesses נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD וַֽאֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-ni- and I אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> 'El. that I [am] God

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Even מִיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> mi-yOm Yea before the day אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, I am He וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and there מִיָּדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Di out of my hand מַצִּ֑יל <S%H5337><s%> matz-Tzil; [was] I [am] he and [there is] none that can deliver אֶפְעַ֖ל <S%H6466><s%> 'ef-'Al I will work וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> u-Mi and who יְשִׁיבֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H7725><s%> ye-shi-Ven-nah. and who shall let ס sa-Mek

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD גֹּאַלְכֶ֖ם <S%H1350><s%> go-'al-Chem your redeemer קְד֣וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ke-Doosh the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel לְמַעַנְכֶ֞ם <S%H4616><s%> le-ma-'an-Chem your sake שִׁלַּ֣חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> shil-Lach-ti For your sake I have sent בָבֶ֗לָה <S%H894><s%> va-Ve-lah, to Babylon וְהוֹרַדְתִּ֤י <S%H3381><s%> ve-ho-rad-Ti and have brought down בָֽרִיחִים֙ <S%H1281><s%> va-ri-Chim all their nobles כֻּלָּ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam, all וְכַשְׂדִּ֖ים <S%H3778><s%> ve-chas-Dim and the Chaldeans בָּאֳנִיּ֥וֹת <S%H591><s%> bo-'o-ni-Yot [is] in the ships רִנָּתָֽם׃ <S%H7440><s%> rin-na-Tam. whose cry

אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD קְדֽוֹשְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H6918><s%> ke-do-she-Chem; your Holy One בּוֹרֵ֥א <S%H1254><s%> bo-Re the creator יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מַלְכְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H4428><s%> mal-ke-Chem. your King ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD הַנּוֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> han-no-Ten which maketh בַּיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> bai-Yam in the sea דָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> Da-rech; a way וּבְמַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> u-ve-Ma-yim waters עַזִּ֖ים <S%H5794><s%> 'az-Zim in the mighty נְתִיבָֽה׃ <S%H5410><s%> ne-ti-Vah. and a path

הַמּוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> ham-mo-Tzi Which bringeth forth רֶֽכֶב־ <S%H7393><s%> re-chev- the chariot וָס֖וּס <S%H5483><s%> va-Sus and horse חַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil the army וְעִזּ֑וּז <S%H5808><s%> ve-'iz-Zuz; and the power יַחְדָּ֤ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav together יִשְׁכְּבוּ֙ <S%H7901><s%> yish-ke-Vu they shall lie down בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- not יָק֔וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> ya-Ku-mu, they shall not rise דָּעֲכ֖וּ <S%H1846><s%> da-'a-Chu they are extinct כַּפִּשְׁתָּ֥ה <S%H6594><s%> kap-pish-Tah as tow כָבֽוּ׃ <S%H3518><s%> cha-Vu. they are quenched

אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּזְכְּר֖וּ <S%H2142><s%> tiz-ke-Ru Remember רִֽאשֹׁנ֑וֹת <S%H7223><s%> ri-sho-Not; ye not the former things וְקַדְמֹנִיּ֖וֹת <S%H6931><s%> ve-kad-mo-ni-Yot the things of old אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּתְבֹּנָֽנוּ׃ <S%H995><s%> tit-bo-Na-nu. neither consider

הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold עֹשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh Behold I will do חֲדָשָׁה֙ <S%H2319><s%> cha-da-Shah a new thing עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah Now תִצְמָ֔ח <S%H6779><s%> titz-Mach, now it shall spring forth הֲל֖וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not תֵֽדָע֑וּהָ <S%H3045><s%> te-da-'U-ha; shall ye not know אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> 'af will even אָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> 'a-Sim it;I will even make בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar in the wilderness דֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech, a way בִּֽישִׁמ֖וֹן <S%H3452><s%> bi-shi-Mon in the desert נְהָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H5104><s%> ne-ha-Rot. [and] rivers

תְּכַבְּדֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H3513><s%> te-chab-be-De-ni shall honour חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat The beast הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh, of the field תַּנִּ֖ים <S%H8577><s%> tan-Nim me the dragons וּבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-Not first יַֽעֲנָ֑ה <S%H3284><s%> ya-'a-Nah; and the ostriches כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because נָתַ֨תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti because I give בַמִּדְבָּ֜ר <S%H4057><s%> vam-mid-Bar in the wilderness מַ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, waters נְהָרוֹת֙ <S%H5104><s%> ne-ha-rOt [and] rivers בִּֽישִׁימֹ֔ן <S%H3452><s%> bi-shi-Mon, in the desert לְהַשְׁק֖וֹת <S%H8248><s%> le-hash-Kot to give drink עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi to my people בְחִירִֽי׃ <S%H972><s%> ve-chi-Ri. my chosen

עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- people זוּ֙ <S%H2098><s%> zu This יָצַ֣רְתִּי <S%H3335><s%> ya-Tzar-ti have I formed לִ֔י Li, תְּהִלָּתִ֖י <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-la-Ti my praise יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H5608><s%> ye-sap-Pe-ru. for myself they shall shew forth ס sa-Mek

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not אֹתִ֥י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti קָרָ֖אתָ <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra-ta But thou hast not called יַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko; upon me O Jacob כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יָגַ֥עְתָּ <S%H3021><s%> ya-Ga'-ta but thou hast been weary בִּ֖י bi יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of me O Israel
